data.eml:eml: Arouiminusetosus, a new species of Scopelocheiridae from Korea (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jung, Tae Won, Coleman, Charles Oliver, Yoon, Seong Myeong (2017): Arouiminusetosus, a new species of Scopelocheiridae from Korea (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassoidea). ZooKeys 706: 17-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.20007, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.20007
